caption.p: Spread in the regression coefficient estimated from CMIP5 models (left column) and the CESM ensemble (right column) for ( a, b) heatwave days; ( c,d) number of events; ( e,f) event duration; and ( g,h) peak intensity. The spread is given by the ensemble 1 st percentile subtracted from the ensemble 99 th percentile. Created using NCAR Command Language (version 6.4.0) [Software]. (2017). http://dx.doi.org/10.5605/D6WD3XH5.
